text: - So my name is Matthias.

manager, it's within the team
of travel and transportation in Germany.

looking for solutions for the customer,

like machine learning,
different intelligence,
you know, IoT things.
Being an an account manager,

it means that you need to
be creative and innovative.

and you maybe are not

When I work for AWS in Germany,

from different cultures,

We have a very open, integrated

And you are part of the
